user_query: number one fan he knows you and can he say hi sure I wanted to throw these to you at the end but I was scared for my position they wouldn't hit the stage come on let's go get them us beautiful that is beautiful as you I cut out every article I could find you did this you like it this is the most beautiful gift anyone has given me now a long time and she seemed genuinely happy and Douglas this is Bradley my director who also happens to be my husband hey Doug I heard a lot about you man also the future daddy of my baby so that evening I went back to the shelter where I've been working for the past 5 years dogs never lie when they talk about love what happened next I'm sorry I don't understand you want to shut down the shelter the state is running up your organization has been stopped City Hall have decided to sell the land's a big day Monday morning 6 a.m. we can ask them for more time if you like thank you I'll see you on Monday you sick firstly we bring out the manager guy's in a wheelchair what the where the hell did they go we'll be okay here pal tell the others okay okay the place where you were living it was pretty well equipped how did you do that I help people people help me back yes but it must have cost a lot of money right true to begin with it was difficult had to pick up a job my biology degree couldn't even open the doors to a fast food restaurant don't smell the flowers my paid for them beautiful thank you Annie Sharon you were on just after this number and

entities.entity_description: Douglas는 Bradley의 남편이자 감독으로, 아기의 아버지가 될 예정인 인물이다
Bradley는 감독이자 Douglas의 남편으로 언급되는 인물이다
Annie는 극 중 등장하는 인물로, 공연 순서와 관련하여 언급된다
Sharon은 극 중 등장하는 인물로, Annie와 함께 공연 순서와 관련하여 언급된다

relationships.relationship_description: Douglas는 Bradley의 남편이며, Bradley가 그의 감독이다
Annie와 Sharon은 함께 공연 순서에서 언급되는 인물들이다
